movies.title: Flic Story
movies.originalTitle: Il était une fois un flic...
movies.plot: For a special mission to destroy drug dealers in Nice, hardcore bachelor inspector Campana has to don the role of a married man with a child. He adjusts himself well but will have to fight a lot before being able to achieve final victory.
movies.simplePlot: For a special mission to destroy drug dealers in Nice, hardcore bachelor inspector Campana has to don the role of a married man with a child. He adjusts himself well but will have to fight a lot before being able to achieve final victory.

biography.bio: Michel Constantin was born on July 13, 1924 in Paris, France as Constantin Hokhloff. He was an actor, known for Le Trou (1960), The Inglorious Bastards (1978) and Cold Sweat (1970). He was married to Maud Serres. He died on August 29, 2003 in Draguignan, Var, France.
biography.name: Michel Constantin

biography.bio: Michael Lonsdale was born on May 24, 1931 in Paris, France as Michael Edward Lonsdale-Crouch. He is an actor, known for Moonraker (1979), Munich (2005) and Ronin (1998).
biography.name: Michael Lonsdale

biography.bio: Daniel Ivernel was born on June 3, 1920 in Versailles, France. He was an actor and writer, known for Diary of a Chambermaid (1964), Les dimanches de Ville d'Avray (1962) and Ulysses (1954). He died on November 11, 1999 in Paris, France.
biography.name: Daniel Ivernel

biography.bio: Mireille Darc was born on May 15, 1938 in Toulon, Var, France as Mireille Aigroz. She is an actress and director, known for Weekend (1967), The Tall Blond Man with One Black Shoe (1972) and Galia (1966). She has been married to Pascal Desprez since September 7, 2002. She was previously married to Pierre Barret.
biography.name: Mireille Darc

biography.bio: Venantino Venantini was born on April 17, 1930 in Fabriano, Marche, Italy as Enrico Venantino Venantini. He is an actor, known for The Sucker (1965), L'immortel (2010) and Ladyhawke (1985).
biography.name: Venantino Venantini

biography.bio: Giuliano Esperanti was born on December 1, 1933 in La Spezia, Liguria, Italy as Giuliano Disperati. He is an actor, known for They Have Changed Their Face (1971), Pelle di bandito (1969) and Flic Story (1972).
biography.name: Giuliano Esperanti

biography.bio: Hervé Hillien is an actor and production manager, known for Flic Story (1972), Des lauriers pour Lila (1974) and L'inconnu dans la maison (1992).
biography.name: Hervé Hillien

biography.bio: Robert Dalban was born on July 19, 1903 in Celles-sur-Belle, Deux-Sèvres, France as Gaston Barré. He is known for his work on Diabolique (1955), Fantomas (1964) and Monsieur Gangster (1963). He was married to Madeleine Robinson. He died on April 3, 1987 in Paris, France.
biography.name: Robert Dalban

actors.character: Le commissaire Chauvet / Superintendent in Nice

biography.bio: Henri Guybet was born on December 21, 1936 in Paris, France. He is an actor, known for The Mad Adventures of 'Rabbi' Jacob (1973), The Pawn (1978) and On a retrouvé la 7ème Compagnie! (1975).
biography.name: Henri Guybet

biography.bio: Phyllis Major was a popular European model who met singer Jackson Browne at the legendary Hollywood venue the Troubador, just after his split with singer Joni Mitchell. Legend has it Browne got into a fight with an unemployed actor who was also making a play for her. Browne lost the fight but got the girl, and the incident was comically memorialized in the song "Ready or Not." Together, they had one child, Ethan Zane Browne, born November 2, 1973 (See Ethan Browne). In December 1975, they were married. Four months later, on March 25, 1976, she was found dead in their Hollywood Hills home. She had overdosed on pills. Browne channeled his loss and depression into the production of his fourth album, "The Pretender." Phyllis is the subject of at least three songs written by Jackson Browne -- "Ready or Not," "Sleep's Dark and Silent Gate," and "In the Shape of a Heart." Her son Ethan has become an in-demand club D.J. and sometime actor.
biography.name: Phyllis Major

biography.bio: Jean-Jacques Moreau was born on February 4, 1947. He is an actor, known for Diva (1981), The Discord (1978) and Vénus noire (2010).
biography.name: Jean-Jacques Moreau

biography.bio: Charles Southwood was born on August 30, 1937 in Los Angeles, California, USA. He was an actor, known for I Am Sartana, Trade Your Guns for a Coffin (1970), Roy Colt and Winchester Jack (1970) and I Protect Myself Against My Enemies (1968). He died on April 8, 2009 in Grants Pass, Oregon, USA.
biography.name: Charles Southwood

biography.bio: Robert Castel was born on May 21, 1933 in Bab El-Oued, Alger, France as Robert Adolphe Castel. He is an actor and writer, known for The Tall Blond Man with One Black Shoe (1972), Mais qu'est-ce que j'ai fait au Bon Dieu pour avoir une femme qui boit dans les cafés avec les hommes? (1980) and The Common Man (1975).
biography.name: Robert Castel

biography.bio: Dado Crostarosa is an actor, known for Le décameron interdit (1972), Love, Passion and Pleasure (1972) and Non commettere atti impuri (1971).
biography.name: Dado Crostarosa

biography.bio: Jean Luisi was born on September 8, 1926 in Santa-Maria-di-Lota, Corse, France. He was an actor and writer, known for La regrettable absence de Terry Monaghan (1973), The Long Absence (1961) and Luis et Margot (1997). He died on July 18, 2006 in Saint-Denis, Seine-Saint-Denis, France.
biography.name: Jean Luisi
